name: Sniper Deer Shooting
description:
A realistic hunting and sniper shooting experience which you might not been able to get in your real life, but you can kill the deer, stag and other animals just as real as you can do it in real hunting. You are bejeweled with a precise sniper shooter gun to shoot furious wild animals. Just start a lifetime hunting blitz.

FEATURES :
- An ultimate hunting action.
- Gameplay is simple yet entertaining.
- Efficient gun control.
- True to life hunting experience.
- High fidelity cool graphics.
- First Person Shooting
- Best 3D Graphics
